Module kivakit.kernel
Package com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.language.threading.latches

Class CompletionLatch

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.language.threading.latches.CompletionLatch
public class CompletionLatch extends Object
A simple wrapper around CountDownLatch that makes code easier to understand. A completion latch can be constructed for one thread with the default constructor or for any number of threads with CompletionLatch(Count). The resulting latch can be waited on by waitForCompletion() and waitForCompletion(Duration) and completion of a thread can be signaled by calling completed(), indicating that the awaited operation has completed. The await() methods return the cause for waking, either WakeState.INTERRUPTED, WakeState.TIMED_OUT OR WakeState.COMPLETED. The method hasCompleted() returns true if the operation has completed.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
